titleStmt.title: These be the articles of the popes Bulle vnder leade translated from latyn into englisshe
titleStmt.author: Sargy, J. (John)
Catholic Church. Pope (1513-1521 : Leo X) aut

notesStmt.note: Bull dated 21 May 1516 authorizing J. Sargy to collect ransom for captives of Turks, wtih letter of protection of Henry VIII, dated 26 Oct. 1518--STC.
Identified as STC 15476 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
